about_the_game:
South Neradonia is going through dark days, pandemic has given the country hard times, democracy shelved with a new authoritarian government, and the only member left from your family, your big sister Jeanne, is missing. You have to investigate and fight back against a powerful conspiracy with your only weapon; hacking systems.

Hack Systems

From the easy home systems to complex government networks, penetrate computer systems to uncover secrets without being detected by network managers. But if you are detected, then you have to move fast!

Upgrade Your Skills


Your aim is to reach and hack servers in systems, or disable all network managers. You can reach servers in the shortest and fastest way hoping not to be detected, or fortify your path against attacks of network managers, it’s all up to you. By leveling up you can upgrade your skills in this strategy.

Comic Book Style Narrative


Uncover a story about a conspiracy in a dark dystopian world with comic book style narrative. What happened to your big sister Jeanne?

About the Game



South Neradonia is going through dark days, pandemic has given the country hard times, democracy shelved with a new authoritarian government, and the only member left from your family, your big sister Jeanne, is missing. You have to investigate and fight back against a powerful conspiracy with your only weapon; hacking systems.

Hack Systems

From the easy home systems to complex government networks, penetrate computer systems to uncover secrets without being detected by network managers. But if you are detected, then you have to move fast!

Upgrade Your Skills


Your aim is to reach and hack servers in systems, or disable all network managers. You can reach servers in the shortest and fastest way hoping not to be detected, or fortify your path against attacks of network managers, it’s all up to you. By leveling up you can upgrade your skills in this strategy.

name: Hack the System

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4ghz+
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT (256 MB)

short_description: Hack the System is an isometric, narrative puzzle. In a dark dystopian country, you have to investigate the conspiracy behind your missing sister by hacking computer networks.
